website_summaries.verdict: A “baby bear” of a mattress, this may be just right for some sleepers, but others will never be comfortable.
pros: A plushy soft memory foam mattress that still provides good underlying support
Sleepers sink right into the cozy upper layer of this mattress
Unrolls and inflates reasonably quickly after arrival
Durable outer cover repels small water spills
cons: Lightweight sleepers may find this mattress too hard at first, but it will conform better with regular use

customer_reviews.title: Very, very soft, way too soft.
customer_reviews.text: Too soft. I’m a bit over 200 lbs and my hips are starting to give me problems and the tendons in my very low back sometimes ‘click’ rather painfully when I’m walking... never had these problems until I slept on this mattress for a couple of weeks. I’m guessing this is being caused by my body being bent into a “U” shape because of the extreme softness. Maybe Amazon will give some indication of how soft these are in the future. Too bad, I don’t know anybody who weighs a lot less than me who might want it so into the garbage it goes. At least it didn’t cost much.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Just opened
customer_reviews.text: Just opened! Thought I would share the process through pictures. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Sides

customer_reviews.title: Very happy and love the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6 foot 3 inches tall and weigh 247 lbs, after 24 hours I fell right asleep. Its very comfortable, light, and simple. I was just looking for a comfortable mattress that’s easy to move around and that’s exactly what I got.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: It needs another 3-4 inch topper
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is ok, but we added another cool gel 3 inch memory foam topper, which improved the comfort level to adequate. Without the topper, someone sitting on the mattress touches bottom and isn't very comfortable until laying flat. We worried that our guests wouldn't be comfy all night, so invested in the 3 inch memory foam topper. After a 10 minute test, I was comfy & can hope my guests will sleep well. Any odor seemed minor to us and easily ignored. NOTE: The box came 1 day late, then came very beat up and ripped. The inside of the mattress was sealed by 2 different plastic "envelopes" and so was not affected.
customer_reviews.author: C Carter

customer_reviews.title: Solid Sleep Desired - Not Achieved
customer_reviews.text: We got the mattress as a replacement to our current one that was falling apart. We hoped this would be a nice entry level mattress, but after a week and a half of tossing and turning we cant report anything good. It is very thin and the foam is not very supportive. The packaging upon arrival was also very beat up, to the point that one side was almost already open. You may want to think twice about purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding bargain!  Comfortable with great support
customer_reviews.text: There are many choices for memory foam mattresses. After searching all options from name brand to no brand, we decided Amazon Basics Memory Foam mattress met our needs at the lowest price! The price was so much lower I doubted the quality. We unpacked the mattress and let it expand for the full 72 hours. No more aching back. Many of the negative comments were about the mattress being too soft. Perhaps those users didn't wait the full 72 hours - when first opened, the mattress feels very soft. Allowing it to expand gives this mattress a medium to firm feel. I highly recommend it and at that price it is hard to go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sleep connoisseur
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had this bed for two months, I’m definitely heavier yet this bed is so comfy, there’s no fiberglass shit that those horror story reviews have on mattresses here. I don’t normally sleep very easily in fact it practically takes horse tranquilizers to knock me out and having a crappy bed doesn’t help. This bed makes it much easier. It really is all foam so if you sit on the corners you kind of slip off because it scrunches but other than that ‘‘twas a great buy. Oh p.s I don’t have a bed frame bc poor, it’s on the floor so it’s 100% supported  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I read about the gasses that it gives off and I thought it would be fine if I aired it out but I was wrong. I couldn't even sleep in my room because of how bad the smell was, I could taste the smell. On top of this, I asked for a refund which they approved, but I had to wait another 3 days because that's the soonest they could pick it up. So I have to keep this thing for another 3 days and sleep in my living room instead. Great! Thanks amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MR RED

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY. ADD TO CART!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mattress, i was a little skeptical about buying a mattress in a box . but honestly its wonderful . of course you have to wait a few days to let it take its natural shape . but it was well worth every penny. I was also skeptical about the reviews because there was some bad ones. But so far im having the best day off . Thanks Amazon . you really stepped up your game . screw paying thousands of dollars . this mattress beats all store bought mattresses . this is my first mattress-in-a-box . cant really compare it to the others considering.
customer_reviews.author: AndiiMcGrewski

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft
customer_reviews.text: It is too soft to sleep. Not a great mattress at all.
customer_reviews.author: H. H. A

customer_reviews.title: Oh so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is so comfortable I don't want to get out of bed. I am very pleased with the product and if it holds up I will definitely repurchase this mattress. The only draw back is the smell that is supposed to dissipate over time. I have two memory foam pillows that took some time to "off gas" so I wasn't shocked. Basically, it is a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Eskins

customer_reviews.title: What gives!
customer_reviews.text: I received this mattress it's 10 and not 12 and it will only expand to 8 + 1/2 it's got problems on the bottom where it would not inflate completely and there's bubbles all over the top of the mattress I'm very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: Hivoltz

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The 12" king size is a great base mattress. On its own, it would still be better than any mattress I've ever had, it's very comfortable. However, I prefer way softer so I have a 3" memory foam topper and a pillow topper on that. I also have a 10" tuft and needle which this is much softer than, to the point I'm considering replacing the tuft and needle with another one of these. It smells when you open it like any other memory foam product. It's barely noticeable after a couple days and completely gone in under a week.
customer_reviews.author: Beck Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Will need help carrying and unboxing
customer_reviews.text: This is my first memory foam mattress and I love it! I tested tempurpedic but chose Amazon’s offering instead and am very happy. It’s extremely soft and comfortable, will never go back to a standard mattress
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft even for a kid!
customer_reviews.text: We've ordered numerous mattresses from Amazon and this is the WORST. Sooooooo squishy. We bought it for my 7 year old and it's like a bean bag. I know kids don't need back support like an adult but this is ridiculous. I would stick to the Zinus brand (which is the same price) or we've even bought one that is spring and foam and they're all way better than this. Now I have to figure out how to return it even though its unrolled 🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Ky Ren

customer_reviews.title: Plush or Mush?
customer_reviews.text: Too soft. I really liked the idea of "plush" since my other memory foam mattresses seemed quite firm; however, after sleeping on both beds for a few months (divorced and do swapping), I found that I woke with aching hips in the middle of the night and in the morning with this mattress. It's as if bottom layer is too soft. I really wanted to make it work. I tried wood over the box spring to firm it up. Didn't help. This mattress might work for kids under 100# but most adults will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gorham

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress. I was sceptical about buying one online, but it's been great. I like a mattress that's not too firm and not too soft, and this one fits the bill, and the price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Too Soft. Doesn't feel like it has supporting layers
customer_reviews.text: Way toooooo soft. It doesn't even feel like it has the layers of normal memory foam mattresses. I think the give away is that it doesn't say in the description if it's firm, medium, or soft. I wouldn't recommend this for anyone except a child.
customer_reviews.author: dyne540

customer_reviews.title: Works for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for 6 months now. It was delivered in a large, heavy unmarked box. The matress is protected with multiple layers of plastic when you take it out of the box. We let it air out for 24 hours before we used it, there was a slight manufacturing smell when we removed the plastic but was barely noticeable after the 24 hrs. This matress is on the SOFT side we sink into it when we lay down, great for side sleeping. It's a good mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany's

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: If the mattress lasts 2 years, it will be the best value for a sub 300 $ purchase. Only time will tell. The mattress is quite firm, I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: San M

customer_reviews.title: Best night sleep I've had in years
customer_reviews.text: What great nights of sleep I've had since I've gotten and set it up. At first I thought it might be too soft, but as I sink in it eventually takes hold of me, supports me. It sleeps cool enough for me now, but I'll wait until the heat of summer as its way before I make final judgement on that. It's comfort continually beckons me back to bed for another bit of sleep and rest. I only took a star off for the poor quality the box was in when it arrived on my door step.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Sink right in
customer_reviews.text: If you’re interested in sinking through a mattress and hitting the bottom this is the product for you! I am not sure who on earth is out there giving this a five star reviews but they are out of their mind. We have been updating the mattresses in our house over the last year or so I’ve bought four different brand mattresses and I have never had that problem before, I’m not sure why this is labeled mattress.. if you need a topper to sink into maybe this would work?!?
customer_reviews.author: SesiLee

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: We got the 12 inch King. so far so good. I am around 250 pounds and I do not bottom out. it is both soft and firm. Soft when you first lay down and then it firms up. it appears to be well constructed and it had no smell at all. the only disappointment is that it only expanded to about 10 inches so not sure if it is defective or not. Overall a good mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Baker

customer_reviews.title: Soft and supportive
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this mattress! It didn't take long to completely inflate and I've not noticed any indents from where I lay at night. It is very comfortable and comparable to my friend's memory foam mattress from zinus but much cheaper! It's not so soft that I sink in but provides enough support without being rock hard or having springs. I haven't had much in the way of back pain since the first night I slept on it and not my old spring mattress.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, good quality, no smell
customer_reviews.text: This is my first memory foam mattress, and it does take a little getting used to -- at first I was worried it would be much too soft. Actually,. though, it's a very comfortable mattress. The quality looks good, it comes with a good cover, and there is no bad smell or anything from the foam. The price is also extremely reasonable compared to other brands that I priced. My one complaint would be that it's a little too wide for my fitted sheets from Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: larsr

customer_reviews.title: So so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I love this mattress. You can't beat the value either! We waited the full 72 hours before using it, I think that's very important to let it fully inflate back to it's normal size. If you're looking for a new mattress you can't do wrong with this and the price is exceptional! We've been sleeping on this for one week now. It's so comfortable I don't want to get out of bed. I no longer wake up with back pain anymore! Highly recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: No better mattress at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for the price. I purchased it because I was in need of a quick replacement, and didn’t want to spend thousands of dollars on a new mattress. Candidly, my expectations were low, but so far the quality and comfort are far better than I expected. I let my mattress rest for the 72 hours the instructions tell you to, and find that it is on the firm side (which my wife and I both prefer). Time will tell how well it holds up, but for now I am quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell overpowering/ comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving 3* because the smell of this is so over powering. We opened it Sunday ( was suppose to arrive Monday, so the early arrival was nice) but it’s tuesday evening and I have it layered with blankets and two sheets and can still hardly stand to lay on it. It’s super comfortable though. Update :::: it’s now the end of April & this mattress is still unbearable with the smell but comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: michael cox

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is extremely comfortable, yet when arrived smelled strongly of chemical/plastic. When unboxed I begun to break out in hives almost immediately. Whatever it is made of or packaged in will literally leave a taste of plastic in your mouth and have your whole room smelling like it. Amazon being the amazing company they are returns it with no problem though. So unfortunate because it is extremely comfy!
customer_reviews.author: ChristAli

customer_reviews.title: This mattress smells funny
customer_reviews.text: It has a chemical smell. When I called Amazon, they want me to figure out how to get it to store (have car) or they will have someone come by and get it but I have to be home and cant be. I have enclosed it in a bag to help eliminate some of the smell but now the plastic crinkles when I sleep. I read where they told others to donate it or trash it. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! My husband & I both hated our old pillow top. It was comfy at first but hurt our backs by morning. We wanted something firmer & this is definitely firm! The first night it was too firm but every night since then has been amazing! We sleep so much better! We are not small people & this mattress doesn’t let us sink too far in but does have enough give to be comfortable. We are aware it may not last as long as expensive ones, but we just needed something cheap for now & this definitely surpassed our expectations! Great buy! Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kasady

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking about getting a tuft and needle to replace our current mattress. Then I started looking done more and found this Amazon basics mattress for Abit half the price. I started doing research and decided to try it first. I really love this mattress. It provides the right amount of support while also providing the right amount of softness. We went with the king size 12 inch. My wife and I love it so much. Probably the most comfortable mattress we have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Harris

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I have slept in over 2,000 beds as a lifetime business traveler. This one is one of the better if you like a soft mattress. It's not quite as good as my Tempodedic, but it's 1/10 the cost. It is extremely soft sitting on, too much. But once you lay down it evens out to about right. Arrived boxed, triple wrapped in plastic, and rolled up (not folded) . After about 6 hours, it was fully expanded and ready to sleep on. No smell at all. Spotless clean.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Trout

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mattress
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst mattress I've ever laid on in my life. I bought it for my nearly 3yo 35# son and even he sinks a solid 3 inches into the mattress making it impossible for him to roll over in his sleep. I'm average weight (180 pounds) and I just about sink through the entire depth of the mattress. We planned to leave this on the floor for safety but tried a frame with slats and also one with box springs in an effort to make it more comfortable. All failed. Do not purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress! We bought this for our guest room after we moved and initially I was a bit skeptical about the quality based solely on the low price. But we were very pleasantly surprised when we received it. The packaging was great, and easy to open, the mattress took its form quickly and was ready to be slept on pretty much right away. The size is true to description and the memory foam is firm and very comfortable to sleep on. We had guests try it out and we tried it ourselves! I highly recommend it to everyone, and will be buying it for ourselves once we are ready to replace our master bedroom one.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Panchenko

customer_reviews.title: Good soft mattress for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my 9 year old. It would be too soft for me, however it is perfect for her. I recommend for kids or light adults or those who like a very soft mattress. It was easy to open and place by my self and only had a slight odor when it first opened that could only be detected if you smelled the mattress up close— it needed a day to air out before I couldn’t smell it anymore and was ok to sleep on. Overall, if you’re looking for an inexpensive soft foam mattress that looks and feels like a higher quality mattress, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: A little soft and too short.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is just a little soft and not quite firm enough in my opinion. If you want a firmer mattress this isn't it. If you're good with soft, you'll find it just right. Also because it's not as thick as a normal mattress, none of my sheets fit so there is always a "pool" of access sheet making it really uncomfortable and messy. I'm guessing they sell sheets for this size but I don't want to replace all the sheets I have. Otherwise it's good quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: SmallBizOwner

customer_reviews.title: Great bed. A little smelly.
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap and super comfortable. Only negative is the smell. I’m a little sensitive to chemically smells. Glade plug ins give me migraines. There was a notable chemical smell for a month and a lingering smell on warmer days, I had the windows open during installation and for a while after.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: SMELL
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy stunk up the whole room even after trying multiple ways to get the off gassing smell out. We let it air out for two days even tried opening the windows and air the room out. The mattress still stinks of horrible chemical smells so bad you can taste it. If you have allergies it will make your throat itch and give you a headache. It made all my sons sheets and stuffed animals stink after being on for only one night. Will be requesting a refund and getting a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Pearly

customer_reviews.title: Daughters loved it
customer_reviews.text: I have to replace three mattresses. My daughters are only 4 and 5. I just didn't want to buy them expensive mattresses. They still constantly spilling their water. So I Figured these should at least last us 2 years. These are very comfy. We only purchased them the 8 in ones. I was pretty impressed how wonderful these actually fit into their Frames. They love them and very excited to go to bed in something comfortable. I fell asleep on them with them. So did my husband and we decided to purchase ours also..Today we are waiting for the arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: Wow! First let me say my wife and I had a high dollar tempurpedic and then went to a Casper which we are pleased with. We purchased this to upgrade our daughters mattress and this thing is a phenomenal value. There is no doubt for the price I would highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress last July and I barley just set up the bed and this mattress over the weekend. I don’t know why I waited so long to assemble it but I’m pleased that I finally did. The mattress is so comfortable. I feel like I sink right into a perfect and comfortable cloud where I sleep like a baby. The only thing that sucks about the whole situation is that I waited so long to assemble it that my warranty is about to expire but I’m pretty confident that I won’t be needing it. I will be buying the same mattress for my daughters bed.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!!
customer_reviews.text: When our great grandaughter found she was pregnant for the third time she thought it was time to move the youngest daughter into the same room with her older sister as she would be needing the nursery for the newborn. Her father designed and built a bunk bed for the girl's room. They could use the mattress from the twin bed that she had been using but they needed a mattress for the other bunk so we decided to gift them with this mattress. It fit perfectly in the new bunk and they have been very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: VeeZee

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: The box is long and a bit heavy, but you can slide it. I opened in garage and it started to immediately inflate. Surprisingly no odor! Plush, but not too plush. Perfect for me :-) I was used to being on a 4" memory foam with inexpensive mattress underneath. This was an upgrade for me and well worth it. Woke up with no pain in my body.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: If you are an adult avoid the 8 inch
customer_reviews.text: We got the 8 inch. This is the thinnest and cheapest one available. It was for a 4 year old that weighs 40 pounds. It’s perfect and will be perfect for her until she’s a preteen probably. I’m leaving 3 stars because if you were an adult this 8 inch model would be absolute trash. There is no support. I can’t imagine anyone over 150 pounds finding comfort in the 8 inch model. If you are an adult spring for the thicker models. If this is a kids bed and they are normal sized this will be great! We are very pleased with it for our 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts quickly to different positions and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Supports sleeping on back or side. Previous (expensive) mattress allowed sleeping on back, only. This foam mattress adjusts quickly to nearly any sleep position. I'm sleeping a deeper sleep and not waking as often as before. Morning stiff joints recover within minutes after rising; it's a very comfortable mattress. Manufacture suggests allowing a day to recover shape after unpacking but I allowed about 8 hours (wanted to try it out). It was fine after 8 hours. It's surprisingly comfortable and a steal at that low price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Too wide for a recessed bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This is 1-2” wider than my previous mattress - measures about 40” wide after a week of expanding - which means it doesn’t really fit in a twin bed frame (ours is from IKEA) without some squishing. Makes changing sheets a pain.
customer_reviews.author: ceejayoz

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Price. Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Have been researching for over a year to find the right mattress for side sleepers, with a reasonable cost. Loving Amazon and their products as much as I do, I gave this a go. Especially considering Amazon's return policy. Blown away by the quality and comfort. Firmness level is about a 6, absolutely perfect for me, a side sleeper. Has almost completely taken away the pain of bursitis in shoulders and hips. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ami Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is wonderful! My daughter wasn't sleeping well on her old mattress, not falling asleep well, waking up at night, and was really tired during the day. I got this for her because she likes my memory foam mattress and she has been sleeping all night and falling asleep quickly. She says she likes it because it is soft. My husband and I are considering getting the same one for us.
customer_reviews.author: elliptical mom

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN TEMPUR-PEDIC AND PURPLE!
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased the Purple mattress after it was time to replace my Tempur-pedic, and it was horrible. (All hype) This one I purchased on a whim and it paid off. Waiting 72 hours for it to be ready was my only complaint but after the wait it was heaven! Btw... The only difference between this and the Tempur-pedic I had before is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It's a memory foam mattress. I pretty good one no less.
customer_reviews.text: I had to put a pillowtop topper on it to stop sinking and get some airflow and stop overheating but after those updates it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: William B

customer_reviews.title: Extremely firm. Be mindful of what you’re looking to get in a bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in hopes of having some relief from the very firm mattress I had prior. Unfortunately, this mattress is extremely firm. If this is “medium firm” I am scared to see what “firm” would feel like. If you are looking for an extremely firm mattress this is for you, but if you are looking for a plusher mattress that may have less back support but is much more comfortable definitely go with another choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard! Horrible mattress and pain in the butt to return!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is described as soft and it is NOT soft! I can’t even sleep on it because it’s so hard. I will be returning ASAP! I’m very disappointed! Was looking forward to this!! Now I have to drive around and figure out what UPS will accept this without a box! I’m beyond upset because they make it seem like returning this wouldn’t be a problem! It’s been nothing but a hassle! I’ll never trust buying another mattress online again. Lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: TB34

customer_reviews.title: Great for curvy/large women
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with back and hip pain for years. I have a large booty which makes sleeping difficult because my spine hurts when I sleep on my back so I often sleep on my side but then my hips hurt after awhile so I sleep on my stomach. Since I got this mattress I can sleep any way I want to because the mattress forms to my body. I have tried temperpedics, sleep number, EVERYTHING! Nothing has compared to this cheap Amazon mattress! I am happy to say that I no longer need to go to the chiropractor multiple times a week. I love this mattress, it's very soft and great for big booty girls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing bad to say
customer_reviews.text: I am completely blown away by people giving this mattress bad reviews. I read the reviews before purchasing and saw the fiberglass issue, and so I’m just not going to unzip the cover. I purchased another mattress cover to put over it. No big deal. For the price here, it is really no big deal. I put this in the guest bedroom. I have slept on it, and it gave me a better night’s sleep than my expensive mattress that cost me three times as much. Guests who have slept on it have said the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for my parents. I shopped online for months looking for something reasonably priced but good quality. The reviews looked good. I am quite impressed with this product. Its half the price of my own mattress but all the same quality. Thanks for making affordable products everyone can enjoy. My parents are sleeping well.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. The mattress is squishier and softer than expected, so if that's your thing then you came to the right place. Firm mattress lovers should look elsewhere. It expanded fully within a day, and did not give off a stinky rubber or chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I'm jealous of my boys mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's new twin bed. This thing fluffed up super nice after coming compact rolled up like a punching bag. We let it sit in a ventilated room for 48 hours. I didn't notice any funny smells or anything that I was warned about. Again I don't sleep in this bed so I can't speak for pain relief but I know it's comfy. I know my son sleeps better (once I actually get him to sleep) I got the 10 inch thick which was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Dude this is the best mattress in the world
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because it was honestly the cheapest mattress I could find with good reviews. I am a FLOORED by how comfortable this mattress is! I previously had a queen sized Costco mattress in a box style mattress and I thought it was amazing, but after I bought the king size amazon mattress it honestly feels like sleeping on cardboard. The top is so cushy! I’m obsessed and I never want to get out of bed
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: It's Going to Take Some Time to Get Used To....
customer_reviews.text: First, it was easy to get it on my bed and opened up nicely. It puffed up within 24 hrs. I slept on it after 17 hours. At first it was a little hard and I ordered the Medium! So if you want a firm mattress, the Medium will do it. I'm a stomach and side sleeper so I think I will have to get used to this. But overall, I'm very pleased. I hope this mattress holds up. I'm letting my friends know about this mattress because it's affordable and very nice. I had no problems moving it and I'm a 60 year old woman. :)
customer_reviews.author: Auntie B

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the mattress. Keep in mind you will not get the real feel of the mattress for 48-72 hours. It takes that long to get into it's normal state, because it arrives in a small box and the air is pumped out from the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of your medications and sleep in this bed, today!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from pain due to a slip and fall accident years ago. I also worked long hours on my feet. I use to take pain medication regularly due to chronic aches and pains in my body. I slept in this bed overnight, and woke up in the morning with no pain at all. I was able to walk on my feet in the morning. My ankles didn’t hurt anymore. That bed became my medication. I didn’t want to get out of bed again. Absolutely fell in love with the product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Maulana Randall

customer_reviews.title: If you like sleeping on a sloping rock, this is the bed for you
customer_reviews.text: I spent literally hours reading reviews to fine a temporary mattress. I only expected it to last a year for the price but thought it would be nice for the year. Absolutely not! This bed is listed as as soft; it’s as hard as a rock. On top of that since the sides are so flimsy and poorly made you roll off the bed if you’re anywhere near the edge. I tried sleeping diagonally and from side to side and nothing helped. I’ve honestly never had such poor nights sleep. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a more expensive mattress from a furniture store. While waiting for it to come in, I bought this mattress. After sleeping on it for one night, I canceled the other mattress and saved myself $500! I love how it conforms to my body, is just the right thickness and is soft without being squishy. I will order another one for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: jthughes

customer_reviews.title: Definitely more firm going down the center of the mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was desperate and short on funds so I bought this mattress about 6 weeks ago. Never expanded to 12” (barely 10”) and even though it’s supposed to feel the same everywhere, there is a noticeable section in the center (from top to bottom) that’s more firm than the sides. Since I’m single, I can sleep in the dead center and get a great night sleep but if I lay on the sides, it gets uncomfortable within few hours. I have spine issues and joint pain and I’ve experienced some relief when I sleep in the center of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Dsheldon2009

customer_reviews.title: Great Memory Foam Mattress at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress replaced my 12 year old pillowtop mattress. I looked at memory foam mattresses locally but prices were close to $1000 and out of my price range. I am very happy with this mattress purchase. Due to a lack of personal padding (lipoatrophy) I needed a soft comfortable mattress. The only negative comment, which would apply to any mattress like this, is there's not enough weight to keep the top sheet and blanket tucked in at the foot of the bed. I just re-tuck every morning when I make the bed. Amazon Prime meant no shipping charges, and this mattress is Corgi-Tested. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Over all a good mattress for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you give this mattress a week to plump up and air out before using it then you have yourself a great mattress. It has a strong plastic smell at first, which I am guessing came from what it was sealed in during shipment. After airing out for one week it has absolutely NO smell. It is very well made and extremely comfortable. I was surprised that it also has a zip up cover over the mattress that can be removed for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Boy is this soft
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheaper mattress, but it is comfortable. I have a feeling this is going to break down faster than other memory foam mattresses, but we primarily will use this in our guest room. So, hopefully it will last us a while. My boys like to sleep on it because they said it is nicer than their much more expensive Puffy mattress. That being said, if you want a soft cheap mattress, this is it. If you need firm, or you expect this to last long term, the old saying "you get what you pay for" is probably going to apply here.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Edge

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Very soft no support
customer_reviews.text: Welll you get what you pay for. This is a very very soft mattress, you just keep sinking. It is ok for a child or spare bed that doesn’t get used much. I wouldn’t buy again, but it’s just a spare bed for company so ok for now.
customer_reviews.author: K-Man

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I have never left a review for any product on Amazon and I felt the need to do so for this one. I was very impressed by the small size of the box the mattress came in. It did take a bit of unwrapping, but it was not tampered with and very clean upon removal. I know it is suggested that the mattress sit for a few days and expand fully, I slept on it immediately, but within a couple of days it was fully expanded. Even without the support of a bed frame, the mattress is comfortable and sturdy. For this price point, I was very impressed and I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McBath

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to throw out several beds. Needed a replacement and this seemed the best option. I'm a pretty big guy and so far this mattress has not sagged or let me down in any other way. Very soft, but I like a soft bed.
customer_reviews.author: Hesperus

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Odd shape and not 8 inches
customer_reviews.text: This was a bad purchase. I have patiently waited 72 hours and the mattress has risen to 6 inches at best. Not only that it’s bigger than my queen size frame!!! I hangs over 3 inches length wise and 1 inch on each side of the width. So my queens sheets barely fit on it. I don’t know what to do because obviously I can’t roll it back in the box and return. This was a big disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: TraceN.

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is saving my life
customer_reviews.text: It’s strange how hard it is to find a soft mattress. I’m now north of 50, and heavier than I used to be. I was waking up in pain on my inner spring mattress, so I switched to foam. I still couldn’t find one that wasn’t solid as a rock and still leaving me sore every morning. Finally I saw that Consumer Reports said this mattress was the softest one it tested. Sure enough, it is wonderful! I put it on top of the last firm foam mattress I’d bought, instead of a box spring. Amazing! I no longer ache in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Best matress I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress I've ever bought! Was a little sceptical when I read the reviews claiming it went to the frame when sitting on the side, keep in mind that's only if your an obvious monster who can't wash themselves correctly because of the layers of fat, or cant stand up or risk breaking their legs. For normal human beings this is sublime! 😍 will be buying again when the mattress needs replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Get the 12" it's better.
customer_reviews.text: Got the 12". It's the only way to go. My sister in law has the 10" , it's ok. Thicker size is much more comfortable especially for people with back issues. Hard to keep sheets on it but just got some mattresses sheet clips work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a smaller woman, 5'8 110 lbs, so memory foam beds are always rock hard to me. I just don't have enough mass to sink in. This bed is plush and comfortable. It is supportive but feels like a gentle hug. As someone that lives with muscle spasms and cramps due to medical issues, this has been a god send. It's only been two nights but night one I slept for 14 hours straight. Such a relief!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Not hypoallergenic 🙂
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is like a supportive marshmellow. It's super soft and holds weight well. My husband is 285 and over 6 feet and couldn't feel the slats. It fluffed up well. Unfortunately it wasn't a fit for us as something in it caused hives and asthma flair up *pretty sure any of this type of foam mattress would have had same issue as I'm allergic to many things.* This item being an Amazon product they they where good about working with me to find a solution to my issue. Thank you Amazon for a solid product and good customer service.🤗
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a few weeks and no complaints yet. I’ll come back and change my review if need be. I purchased this for my 17 year old son that was complaining of a sore back in the morning. He has been very happy with the level of comfort and no matter if you’re a back, stomach or side sleeper this bed works!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian STop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 6” height mattress for our 3yo because we don’t want it to be too high for him. It’s actually perfect when we placed the mattress on his new twin sized bed. We bought 2 of these because his bed has a trundle and only a 6”-8” height mattress can fit on the trundle. It’s not too firm and not too soft it’s just perfect for what we need right now. I tried it myself and so far it’s comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Firm and feels great - but smells awful
customer_reviews.text: The firmness is perfect and the bed feels absolutely amazing! However the stench is soooo STRONG! I let the mattress air out for a week but that didn’t help at all. I’ve had the mattress for months and there’s still a stench. Can’t sleep with the bedroom door closed because the fumes would make me sick. So if you have a year or so to let the mattress air out it’s perfect but the stench is sometimes unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but softer than I was expecting, actually sinks down an inch or two when I sit on it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress as well as two other different mattresses at the same time. I think this one is the softest because its the only one that is concave when I sit or lay on it. It sinks down a few inches. This can make you feel warmer than the mattresses that hold their shape better. I don't like hard mattresses, I wanted a soft one, it just feels like I'm sinking down into it when I lay on it. If you want a little more support try the Zinus Ultima Comfort Memory Foam 8 Inch Mattress, or the PrimaSleep Wave Gel Infused Memory Foam Mattress, 10'' or the Perfect Cloud Atlas Gel-Plus 10-Inch Memory
customer_reviews.author: Shell Ash

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for a guest bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my youngest child as an update from a toddler bed. It's ok. As an adult, I would have difficulty getting a good night's sleep on it (I've tried), however it seems to be fine for my child. The main issue I have with the bed is the smell. I can not get rid of the chemical smell no matter how long I air the bed outside. Not sure what to do except to wait for it to subside.
customer_reviews.author: sobefreak13

customer_reviews.title: Return is a headache.  12" mattress only got up to 10"  thick.
customer_reviews.text: If you have to return it you have to come up with a box to pack a fully expanded mattress yourself. Or you have to buy a sealable mattress bag and shrink the foam mattress yourself. It's not like Casper or other foam mattress companies that come to you to take it back. The comfort quality was good. But I ordered 12" thick mattress. I unpacked it, and waited a full week but the thickness barely got to 10".
customer_reviews.author: Powder43

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress arrived on time. It was packaged very well. It takes a couple of days to fully inflate. It's very comfortable mattress. We had it a 3 inch memory foam topper on top of it. This is the second bed we put together that way with this mattress. And both are extremely comfortable and easy to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: NMSmith

customer_reviews.title: Mattress better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was better than expected. It took a few days to fully gain its height. It was sinking when sitting at first but was not noticeable after a few days. I appreciate the medium feel of the 12 inch which makes it very functional for side sleeping, stomach, and back. I would recommend this affordable mattress. It’s better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa P

customer_reviews.title: So comfy but the chemical smell..
customer_reviews.text: Crazy comfortable BUT the chemical smell lingers forever. We let it air out for 3 whole days before putting sheets on and it’s been a month and I can still smell it when I walk in the room. It’s getting less and less but taking forever EDIT: I bought this mattress again because it’s sooo comfortable and the chemical smell was SO minimal!! Changing review from 3 star to 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyntara

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I like a mattress a little in the softer side. This fits the bill. Softness and cozy comfort along with just the right support. I don’t wake up sore anymore. This mattress had a very good review in Consumer Reports. Comparing it to a very high priced memory foam mattress. Great value for the price. If I had a complaint it would only be that it never expanded to the full 12 inches. So I have to assume, the measurements where taken by a man. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Paula Davis

customer_reviews.title: Another knockout Amazon Basics product. SURPRISE!
customer_reviews.text: To anyone saying this mattress is too soft, LET IT SET FOR 72 HOURS!(or lose a little weight?) Its firm but not too firm, it cradles my body but without me sinking into it. Its extremely comfortable, especially coming over from a horrible old box spring. It arrived fast, like literally a day, i honestly dont understand how they do this but the future is awesome. Also, a 12" queen for under $300? Is amazon crazy? Yes. And i love them for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Read!
customer_reviews.text: I don't miss my old spring and box mattress set AT ALL!!!!. After letting it settle for 72hrs as directed in the instructions, I laid down all of the rest of my amazon basics toppings (sheet, quilted topper, pillows and other linens) I couldn't believe in the quality amazon basics have. Its a shame I barely learned about amazon basics. Can't wait to see what else they have in store (literally) I watched on youtube a guy testing the quality of their motor oil compared yo other top brands and amazon held up way beyond other leading brands. Try it all out you may be surprised by a surprize.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set-Up, And Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought twin mattresses for our daughters to replace their traditional spring mattresses. They were easy to remove from packaging, and didn’t take too long to start expanding. However, it did take about 48 hours for mattresses to fully expand, but are very comfortable. They didn’t have the typical “bed in a box” smell that many do when you first remove them from the package. Very happy with these. Would recommend, especially for kids/teens.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep in years! Should have purchased sooner!
customer_reviews.text: We have never ordered a mattress online and were a bit skeptical of the whole "mattress in a box" concept, especially at such a great price. "It's Amazon, we can always return it if we don't like it" my wife said... so we ordered it. It took two days to fully decompress. The first night we slept on it? BEST sleep in years! Far more comfortable than other, much more expensive memory foam mattresses. Buy this - you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft mattress, extremely plush in the middle
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the mattress is really good. It came tightly packaged but expanded pretty quickly. My mother in law was wanting something new so we tried this, but it was too soft for her, it did not support her back like she wanted, she felt like she sunk in the middle too deep. If you desire a very soft extra plush mattress, this could be just what you are looking for, but if you need anything medium firm or stronger, this will definitely be too soft for your sleeping comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis the dog

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Got a twin for my teen. She likes it alot. Was told 72 hours to fluff fully but really it seemed like less time. Probably could have used it after 48 but didnt. The corners arent square they are more rounded. From reviews it mentions dont take off the cover so I dont intend to. Will update review if I find any issues but so far it's great. Good quality, good price. Mostly soft and not firm which is what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Bad for your heath
customer_reviews.text: I can’t sleep since getting this mattress😥it’s not memory foam, no support AT ALL. ( I weight about 165) my butt sinks so low, I can’t get comfortable in any position. my entire body hurts when I lay down and all my joints hurt from my toes to my head! I’m so disappointed. Invest a little more and get something better because now I gotta schedule a pick up so I can return this. Because I have to repeat the mattress buying and unboxing all over again. Sleep is health and we can’t mess around with our health. I hope you found this review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Stinks, literally
customer_reviews.text: The instructions said to let this thing air out for 72 hours. I did that according to directions. After the 72 hours, it still smelled bad, so I let it air out for several days more. It still smells bad.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: 8" Mattress is WAY TOO SOFT! Use Caution!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 8" mattress, full size. Not sure how the reviews are so stellar as this mattress is as supportive as sleeping on a bag of cotton balls. There is ZERO support. I literally "bottom out" on the box spring below. I am 6'1", 200 lbs for reference. I'll be submitting a return asap as this thing is not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my parents
customer_reviews.text: My parents wanted a new mattress. They were shopping around and wanted a memory foam one. They almost went with an expensive one, but we stopped them when we read our consumer reports magazine. Which had Amazon's basic's as one of the best memory foam mattress. At that price they were excited to get it. They have had it a little over 5 months and still love it. My mom likes that she doesn't feel my dad rolling around like she could on the old spring kind (now if only she can keep him from taking the blankets when he rolls). I am thinking when I need a new one, I will be getting this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Turner

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to sweat
customer_reviews.text: The bed is super comfortable but Jesus does it trap heat, Ive had various foam mattresses purchased from amazon so I thought what better than to get an amazon one and I was so wrong, it smelled which has never happened. Which was fine I put baking soda over night and vacuumed it up and the smell somewhat went away. But once I slept on it, even with my AC on I’m sweating like crazy. Still I think the bed is very comfortable and if you like a foam mattress that’s not so stiff I recommend this bed just be prepared to sweat or buy linen/mattress foam topped that is meant to cool you down
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Did not expand
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th bed in a box I have ordered in the last 5 years. My sons previous bed was peed on by our cat and I couldn't get the smell out after 6 weeks. This mattress is for a lofted bed in an rv, so I wanted thin for head space. The bed expanded to almost 7 inches in the middle. The ends up the bed are misshapen and about 4 to 5 inches. I have never had this happen before with previous purchases. The mattress seems very soft but I am doubtful of the value and longevity with the misshapen corners. Will give it 72 hours before deciding to ship back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 months on this mattress and have been very impressed. Much better than our old mattress, and came quickly. I don't know how well it will hold up long term but the plan is to move it to a guest bed eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 10-Inch Memory Foam Mattress - Soft Plush Feel, Queen
product_meta.description:
Size:Queen| Style Name:10-Inch| Design:Mattress

Forget about bad nights with this relaxing and cool memory foam mattress by Amazon Basics. Get a soft-plush feel throughout the night, and feel safe as it is Certipur-US certified. The middle soft foam layer has breathable air holes, which allow air to circulate inside the mattress. Hard foam bottom layer provides durability, stability and enhanced body support. This layer also provides airflow thanks to its wavy surface.



Please allow up to 72 hours for the mattress to decompress and for any potential odor to dissipate. We recommend removing all bed sheets from the mattress and letting it air out in a well ventilated space.
feature_bullets: Plush-feeling memory-foam layer adapts to the contours of the body and comfortably conforms to different sleep positions
Queen-size memory-foam mattress with 3 foam layers for optimal softness and support
Item's dimensions: 80" W x 60"L x 10"H. Item's weight: 52.4 lbs.
A safe mattress to sleep on: Certipur-US certified foam, safe and quality foam and Oeko-Tex certified top fabric.
The middle soft foam layer has breathable air holes, which allow air to circulate inside the mattress
Hard foam bottom layer provides durability, stability and enhanced body support. This layer also provides airflow thanks to its wavy surface.

Please allow up to 72 hours for the mattress to decompress and for any potential odor to dissipate. We recommend removing all bed sheets from the mattress and letting it air out in a well ventilated space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,295 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
